argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rerpdivcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( A / B ) e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | #P_recn | |- ( ( A / B ) e. RR -> ( A / B ) e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_znegclb | |- ( ( A / B ) e. CC -> ( ( A / B ) e. ZZ <-> -u ( A / B ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A / B ) e. ZZ <-> -u ( A / B ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_recn | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. CC ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_rpcn | |- ( B e. RR+ -> B e. CC ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_rpne0 | |- ( B e. RR+ -> B =/= 0 ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> B =/= 0 ) |
| 11 | 6, 8, 10 | #P_divnegd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> -u ( A / B ) = ( -u A / B ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( -u ( A / B ) e. ZZ <-> ( -u A / B ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 12 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A / B ) e. ZZ <-> ( -u A / B ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_mod0 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod B ) = 0 <-> ( A / B ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_renegcl | |- ( A e. RR -> -u A e. RR ) |
| 16 |  | #P_mod0 | |- ( ( -u A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( -u A mod B ) = 0 <-> ( -u A / B ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( -u A mod B ) = 0 <-> ( -u A / B ) e. ZZ ) ) |
| 18 | 13, 14, 17 | #P_3bitr4d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod B ) = 0 <-> ( -u A mod B ) = 0 ) ) |
